channel.title: How do i add drops to pking
channel.description: HOW DO I ADD PVP DROPS TO PKING IN A 508 SERVER

item.title: How do i add drops to pking
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“mithpkz, post:3, topic:287239”]In Item.java put this

Code:
public static int Pkdrop[] = {####,####,####};

    public static int randomPkdrop()
    {
        return Pkdrop[(int)(Math.random()*Pkdrop.length)];
    }

In your apply dead method add this

Code:
createGroundItem(Item.randomPkdrop(), 2);

WHICH ITEM.JAVA theirs dropitem.java, itemonitem.java, pickupitem.java and grounditem.java
and whats apply dead method?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2009, 06:11:37 pm[/size][hr][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=379829.msg2855790#msg2855790 date=1246838655]
In Item.java put this

[code]public static int Pkdrop[] = {####,####,####};

    public static int randomPkdrop()
    {
        return Pkdrop[(int)(Math.random()*Pkdrop.length)];
    }[/code]

In your apply dead method add this

createGroundItem(Item.randomPkdrop(), 2);

[/quote]

which one[/quote]
STOP TALKING IN CAPS, he/she means item.java just item lol.

Read full topic
